objects.text:
• High-visibility neon design
• Weather-resistant fabric
• Half-zip pullover style
• Signature Lacoste logo

product_details.name: Lacoste Sport Neon Anorak Pullover - Urban Athletic Windbreaker
product_details.description:
• High-visibility neon yellow/lime colorway for standout style
• Half-zip pullover design with front kangaroo pocket
• Weather-resistant fabric perfect for changing conditions
• Athletic fit with comfortable ribbed cuffs and hem
• Adjustable hood with drawstring for customized protection
• Signature Lacoste crocodile logo embroidery
• Contrasting black zipper details and pocket trim
• Lightweight and packable construction
• Perfect for casual streetwear or athletic activities
• Available in regular fit sizing for comfortable wear

banner_details:
The banner features a sporty and vibrant promotional layout for an urban windbreaker. The background combines deep navy and forest green tones with diagonal neon green accents and geometric patterns that enhance the modern aesthetic. A large, bold heading (`heading_1` and `heading_2`) stands out at the top, highlighting the product's core appeal. A bright subheading (`subheading`) reinforces the brand and product line, while a bullet-point list (`description`) outlines key features effectively. The price (`price`) is prominently displayed near the center-bottom, supported by an attention-grabbing promotional tag (`tagline`). At the base, a contrasting button (`cta_button`) with vibrant green fill and centered call-to-action text (`cta`) directs user engagement. On the right, a realistic image (`product_image`) of a man wearing the neon windbreaker solidifies visual identity.

**Color Palette:**
- Neon Green: #acff00 / #b9ff00
- Dark Navy: #1A2132
- Forest Green: #264040
- White: #ffffff
- Coral Red: #ff6b6b
product_color: The product image features a youthful, sporty look centered on a neon lime green jacket (#D4FF33), which serves as the dominant and eye-catching color. This vibrant hue brings energy and modern appeal. Black (#000000) is used for the pants, zipper accents on the jacket, and the bag, grounding the look with contrast and highlighting the lime without overpowering it. White (#FFFFFF) sneakers add a clean, minimal base, balancing the brightness. The black and lime are seamlessly blended through minimalistic lines, while pops of metallic gray (#9E9E9E) on the bag add depth. Use these key colors to design a bold, fresh ad banner.
